alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 04 at 2:33PM AKST until February 05 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations around one inch. North winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will cause visibility near zero at times. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are occuring in the Bering Strait, and are expected to spread to St Lawrence Island tonight. Conditions are expected to improve slightly Sunday afternoon, but windy conditions and blowing snow will continue into Monday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
